thread.title: Joe shmo
thread.title_full: PRO Import Tuners.com reviewed by Joe shmo

author: Joe shmo
title: Joe shmo
text: I had an issue with a weapon r overflow tank that I bought for my 1995 Mazda Miata , the description said no modification required but that's a lie. I emailed customer service to explain that the description of the product was incorrect, they disregarded what I said and stated to me that the description says may need some modification. I know what the description claimed, I'm not blind. The mishimoto radiator and heater hoses were perfect, I would not recommend buying anything weapon r for your vehicle. And as far as this company goes I'd rather take my business where they do not make false claims about the products they are selling and do not disregard the information you give them.
